Package com.example.ex_motricite

Class OperatorDAO

java.lang.Object
com.example.ex_motricite.OperatorDAO
public class OperatorDAO extends Object
The OperatorDAO class represents a DAO (Data Access Object) for operators.

This class is used to retrieve operator data from a database. It provides methods to retrieve, add, delete, and update operator data in the database.

Author: Ferreria Version: 1.0
